15.『庭具倉庫』の 説明です。|<br>|マイタウンでは つかうものからの|庭具の配:
How to use the garden tools warehouse... In|My Town, you can not only place garden tools|from the items you own, but you can also|
|share garden tools owned by other people...|In My Town, you can share garden tools with|the owner or other authorized users by|
|placing them in the "Garden Tools Warehouse"|in the door menu... The garden tools in the|warehouse will be marked as "Warehouse", so|
|try to move the tools to the warehouse and|see how it looks...In addition, the garden tool shed is the|garden tool management space for the whole of|My Town, so any garden tools you place will|
|be included in the garden tool shed. The|total number of garden tools you can have in|My Town is 200... Once you have placed garden|
|tools in the garden tool storage, you can|place them in the "My Town Garden Tools"|section of the "Furniture and Garden Tools"|
|list...You can also transfer garden tools to your|objects by selecting the "Touch and clean"|option... Make good use of the garden tools|
|warehouse to place a variety of garden tools|and create an attractive My Town...

|sign that says "Home" and then you'll be able|to use some of the features...

22.『庭具倉庫』の 説明です。|<br>|マイタウンでは つかうものからの|庭具の配:
How to use the garden tools warehouse... In|My Town, you can not only place garden tools|from the items you own, but you can also|
|share garden tools owned by other people...|In My Town, you can share garden tools with|the owner or other authorized users by|
|placing them in the "Garden Tools Warehouse"|in the door menu... In addition, the garden|tools storage is a space where you can manage|
|your garden tools for the whole of your town,|including the tools you have placed in the|garden tools storage. Garden tools marked as|
|"Storage" in the list are shared garden tools|that have been placed in the Storage by the|owner or other authorized person, and can be|
|placed in the garden... If there are other|garden tools nearby, you can move them from|the same list... The total number of garden|
|tools you can have in your town is 150,|including those in the garden tool shed...|You can also transfer garden tools to objects|
|you want to use by selecting the "Touch and|clean" option... Use the garden tools|warehouse to create an attractive My Town by|
|placing a variety of garden tools...
